KSP 0.90.0 32bits 

Problem: parts hovering around an other part (it may have shrunk, on second thought):

![065844e8d0.jpg](http://puu.sh/hdO11/065844e8d0.jpg)

How it happened: I believe it was after time-warp, it looked like this. Restarting the game didn't have any effect.

Installed mods (CKAN screenshot):

![9c552fb963.png](http://puu.sh/hdNVM/9c552fb963.png)

Log: [http://puu.sh/hdO6E/237ddd4821.log](http://puu.sh/hdO6E/237ddd4821.log)
Does it affect gameplay/functionality ? Is there a known work-around ? I don't see it mentioned on the TweakScale mod page.
